data.title: FILMCART
data.meta_description: SMARTONE cart is made for film industry professionals who value ​​time, quality and work comfort.
data.text:
Wheels:

220mm diameter Pneumatic wheels with two brakes.

260mm diameter Pneumatic wheels with two brakes (additional option)

Contains:

Filmcart smartone (bottom platform, upper platofrm)

2x wheels swivel with brakes (220mm diameter)

2x wheels normal without brakes (220mm diameter)

35mm dimeter pipe (90cm long)

Dimensions:

Folding cart (H×W×L): 170 × 630 × 1045 mm

Striped cart (H×W×L): 1020 × 630 × 1045mm

Between lower platform and the upper platform is 655mm

Between the lower platform side wall and the upper platform is 588mm

Platform inside dimensions 596mm x 917mm

Wall thick 3mm

1 m2 work space total on both platforms

Material:

Aluminum

Weight:

38.4 kg (without box)

42.4 kg (with box)

To packages option: 28 kg (cart), 18 kg (wheels)

Capacity:

Max 200 kg

Package Dimensions:

(H×W×L): 220 × 730 × 1110 mm

SMARTONE STANDARD UPGRADED Plus with height adjustment system

Smartone Upgraded Plus is a double deck cart that can be used as a workstation or to transport equipment.

New top shelf with one collabsible wall provides comfortable conditions while working with a computer. Folding is very easy and takes only seconds.

Height adjustment system allows you to change height of top shelf in range from 70,5cm to 91,5cm with regular wheels and from 75cm to 96cm with off-road wheels, with 3cm in-between stages.

Adjusting is easy and does not require any tools.

Handles with built-in pipe holders make construction thougher and allow to install ball mount directly on the pipe.

Smartone Upgraded Plus is super easy to fold, requires no tools to attach or remove any part of the cart and can be ready to work on in less than 2 minutes.

Compact size allows the cart to transport easily all parts in one case.

220mm or 260mm diameter wheels fits inside the collpased cart.
